channel.title: [317] Changing WEAPON Requirments [317] Help!
channel.description:
I have Dragon claws and on my client and it sees it as a defender or a dragon weapon with defence Dclaws is supposed to be 1def not 60def so i had to made dragon armor 1def which is silly but made dclaws are now 1def but i want to make DRAGON ARMOR 60 def again and DRAGON CLAWS 1 def and 60att, but i need some help with this.
I done it the wrong way l0l and im waiting for someone to correct me :eek: SOMEONE PLEASE SHOW ME A [TUT] ON DOING THIS PLEASE!!!!!
